p.text: get command focus makes an object active and it will work with the user (eg to get focus text field , and subsequent pressing of buttons the user will be printed in the text box).

descriptionarticle.textAll:
Concept
Focus has the same meaning as in cameras, ie be in focus means to be in the spotlight. In this case, be the object of your attention. If the object is not in focus, then the object is still in working condition , just the user probably does not use it yet.
